titles.title: Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects minority Members to the House Committees on: (1) the Budget; (2) the Judiciary; (3) Homeland Security; and (4) Standards of Official Conduct.
